Rank.Description: Damaging abilities that consume Attack Points deal an additional 2% damage.
Damaging abilities that consume Attack Points deal an additional 4% damage.
Damaging abilities that consume Attack Points deal an additional 6% damage.
Damaging abilities that consume Attack Points deal an additional 8% damage.
Damaging abilities that consume Attack Points deal an additional 10% damage.
Increases Strength by 2%.
Increases Strength by 4%.
Increases Strength by 6%.
Increases Strength by 8%.
Increases Strength by 10%.

Ability.Description: Deals 377 to 417 Physical damage to up to 6 enemies. Bleeds 1314 health over 15s. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Savage Sweep ability.
Your attacks ignore 2% of the target's Armor and Resist.
Your attacks ignore 4% of the target's Armor and Resist.
Your attacks ignore 6% of the target's Armor and Resist.
Your attacks ignore 8% of the target's Armor and Resist.
Your attacks ignore 10% of the target's Armor and Resist.
Increases damage of Area of Effect attacks by 5%.
Increases damage of Area of Effect attacks by 10%.
Increases damage of Area of Effect attacks by 15%.
Bull Rush adds an additional Attack Point when used. Reduces the cooldown of Bull Rush by 5 seconds.
Increases your chance to Dodge by 1%, your Attack Power by 2%, and Weapon Contribution by 2%.
Increases your chance to Dodge by 2%, your Attack Power by 4%, and Weapon Contribution by 4%.
Increases your chance to Dodge by 3%, your Attack Power by 6%, and Weapon Contribution by 6%.

Ability.Description:
Chains to up to 5 enemies, dealing Physical damage and healing the Warrior for each enemy it affects:
1 Point: 496 health, 228 damage. 2 Points: 640 health, 279 damage. 3 Points: 856 health, 355 damage.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Chains of Life ability.
Increases Soldier's Bearing to 4%, Slayer's Bearing to 5%, Juggernaut’s Bearing to 1.3%, Destroyer’s Bearing to 50%, and Reaper’s Bearing to 35%.
Increases Soldier's Bearing to 5%, Slayer's Bearing to 7%, Juggernaut’s Bearing to 1.6%, Destroyer’s Bearing to 75%, and Reaper’s Bearing to 40%.
Increases Soldier's Bearing to 6%, Slayer's Bearing to 9%, Juggernaut’s Bearing to 2%, Destroyer’s Bearing to 100%, and Reaper’s Bearing to 45%.

Ability.Description: Absorbs 50% of damage taken up to 2757 damage. Lasts 30s. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.

Rank.Description: Unlocks Weapon Defense.
On a successful ability hit you have a 20% chance of increasing Strength by 5% for 15 seconds.
On a successful ability hit you have a 20% chance of increasing Strength by 10% for 15 seconds.
On a successful ability hit you have a 20% chance of increasing Strength by 15% for 15 seconds.
On a successful ability hit you have a 20% chance of increasing Strength by 20% for 15 seconds.
On a successful ability hit you have a 20% chance of increasing Strength by 25% for 15 seconds.
Enemies affected by a Mark take an increased 3% damage from your attacks for 1m.
Enemies affected by a Mark take an increased 6% damage from your attacks for 1m.
Enemies affected by a Mark take an increased 9% damage from your attacks for 1m.
Increases the range on all Charge attacks by 2 meters. Increases damage done with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases the range on all Charge attacks by 4 meters. Increases damage done with melee weapons by 4%.
Increases the range on all Charge attacks by 6 meters. Increases damage done with melee weapons by 6%.

Ability.Description: Reduces damage taken and increases damage dealt by 1% for each nearby enemy for 10s after using an AOE attack. Stacks up to 5 times. Only 1 Bearing can be active at a time. Lasts 1 hour.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the ability Juggernaut's Bearing.
Damaging an enemy with Bull Rush or a Finisher causes nearby enemies to take 5% more damage from your attacks for 15 seconds.
Damaging an enemy with Bull Rush or a Finisher causes nearby enemies to take 10% more damage from your attacks for 15 seconds.
Damaging an enemy with Bull Rush or a Finisher causes nearby enemies to take 15% more damage from your attacks for 15 seconds.
Champion Area of Effect attacks hit 1 additional target. Reduces the Power cost of all Champion abilities by 1.
Champion Area of Effect attacks hit 2 additional target. Reduces the Power cost of all Champion abilities by 2.

Ability.Description: Forces the next damaging Physical ability to Critically Hit. Lasts 30s.

Rank.Description: Unlocks Inescapable ability.
When you cast Weapon Defense, you gain an additional absorb equal to 15% of your Attack Power per nearby enemy up to a maximum of 5.
Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to area of effect attacks by 5%.
Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to area of effect attacks by 10%.
Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to area of effect attacks by 15%.

Ability.Description: When hit by an attack, there is a 25% chance of dealing 689 Physical back against the attacker. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Shared Suffering ability.
Reduces cooldown on Cornered Beast by 7.5 seconds. Increases damage done by 3%.
Reduces cooldown on Cornered Beast by 15 seconds. Increases damage done by 6%.
Increases the damage of Champion abilities by 10%.
Increases the damage of Champion abilities by 20%.
Increases the damage of Champion abilities by 30%.

Ability.Description: Up to 8 nearby enemies deal 10% less damage to the Warrior for 60s. Only 1 Mark can be active at a time. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Mark of Exclusion ability.

Ability.Description:
Deals Physical damage per Attack Point to up to 6 enemies, in addition to increasing the damage the enemy takes from the Warrior's attacks for 20s:
1 Point: 921, 5%. 2 Points: 1166, 10%. 3 Points: 1534, 15%.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Thunderous Strike ability.
Your damaging attacks have a 20% chance of recovering 2 Power. Can only trigger once every 3 seconds.
Your damaging attacks have a 20% chance of recovering 4 Power. Can only trigger once every 3 seconds.
Your damaging attacks have a 20% chance of recovering 6 Power. Can only trigger once every 3 seconds.

AbilityRank.Description: When hit by an attack, there is a 25% chance of dealing 689 Physical back against the attacker. Lasts 1h.
Up to 8 nearby enemies deal 10% less damage to the Warrior for 60s. Only 1 Mark can be active at a time. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.

Roots target for 6s. Fears nearby enemies for 6s or until damaged.

The next single target attacks deal 100% of their damage to up to 7 additional enemies:
1 Point: 1 Attack. 2 Points: 2 Attacks. 3 Points: 3 Attacks.
Increases the damage of single target attacks by 30%. Only 1 Bearing can be active at a time. Lasts 1 hour.
Resets the cooldown of all charges. The next charge no longer has a cooldown and its range is increased by 10m.

Chains to up to 8 enemies, Dealing Physical damage to up to 5 enemies for each enemy it affects:
1 Point: 377 damage. 2 Points: 568 damage. 3 Points: 858 damage.
Base Damage is increased by 1% for each Point spent in the Champion Soul.
Grants all Bearings. Increases damage done by 10%.

Deals 1248 to 1380 Physical damage. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.

Deals Physical damage per Attack Point to up to 6 nearby enemies.
1 Point: 1346 damage. 2 Points: 2031 damage. 3 Points: 3066 damage.

Abilities that consume 3 Attack points have a 25% chance to grant an Attack Point. Only one Bearing can be active at a time. Lasts 1 hour.
Attack hits up to 6 enemies multiple times for 4579 Physical damage over the next 3 seconds. Awards 1 Attack Point every second.
Deals 821 to 908 Physical damage to up to 6 enemies. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.
